EmailTemplate.textOnly:
The International School of Moscow Part of The British Schools Group
Dear Parents,
Please click on the links below to download the schedules for the parent & teacher consultations next week.

If you have any questions, please do not hesitate to me, Katie Foster, at ekaterina.foster@internationalschool.ru
Kind regards,
Katie Foster
Front Desk Upper School Campus
The International School of Moscow World Class Education
